00089     static bool PlayerScoreSortProcess(Player* p1, Player* p2)
00090     {
00091         if(p1->GetScore() == p2->GetScore())
00092             return (p1->GetName() > p2->GetName());
00093         else
00094             return (p1->GetScore() > p2->GetScore());
00095     }
